title: Foundations of Accounting: Systematic Understanding Through Self-Directed Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical computation skills and fundamental document literacy
context.additional_context: Learners are working professionals or self-employed individuals interested in practical accounting applications. The program combines weekly 2-hour synchronous sessions with asynchronous learning activities in a bring-your-own-device (BYOD) environment.

learning_goals: Learners will understand the basic structure of balance sheets and income statements and analyze real-world financial cases
Students can perform basic accounting records by applying the journal entry and posting process
Students can derive information necessary for managerial decision-making by utilizing cost calculation methods
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
